turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I was looking to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you want a grande caramel macchiato with whole milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which starbucks would you like to pick that up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's the one that's closest to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: are you close to the starbucks on alhambra blvd?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i place your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a grande caramel macchiato with whole milk to be picked up at the starbucks on alhambra blvd.
